Re-Cycle

Eco Friendly Sightseeing

Our goal is to provide fun, safe and unforgettable experience! Through superior customer service we want to create memories and smiles that last a lifetime.


Re-cycle was founded with a vision of a more dynamic and enviormentally friendly way to travel. Oslo is a green city which is also one of the most active cities in the world. The inhabitants of Oslo enjoy thousands of kilometers of hiking paths and ski trails in the city woods, hundreds of lakes surrounding the city and forty islands dotting the Oslo fjord. Oslo is an active and green city whiche deserves to be discovered in a green way! Our guides are the perfect locals to show you the real Oslo, the way the city was meant to be seen.

We belive that Re-cycle is the best and most eco friendly way to experience Oslo
